amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 115-679 to make technical and conforming changes, in addition to making amendments to titles IV, VI and XI of H.R. 2. These amendments consist of changes to nutrition programs, requiring consultation between USDA and NTIA on broadband loan and grant programs and establishing a food access liaison at USDA.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Conaway amendment (A021) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A021) offered by Mr. Conaway.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Conaway amendment (A021) Agreed to by voice vote.
